entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning late in the morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
